segments.text: Front Desk , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to move to another room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there anything uncomfortable in your room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . The air-conditioner in this room doesn't work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I have your room number , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Mr . Wang , may I send a room attendant to check it for you first ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( 15 minutes later ) Mr . Wang , we are deeply sorry for the inconvenience . The maintenance might last for a long time , may I offer you another room ?
segments.speaker: S1
